text: you wrote a play based on the letters of

then then I I realized what a wonderful

course I mean I felt very close to her
she became for me someone who simply
wouldn't give up she had so many

the fact that she was discovering

know what it was it was by accident she

coming out of uranium and then she
realized it was radiation coming out of
stuff that had no uranium in it so was
it was a true discovery so that was had
a dig through seven tons of ore herself
and boil it down it took years and hard
work and smelling the acid fumes and
then after all of that she was facing
the obstacle of being considered just a

so she had nothing but obstacles but she

my spirits which flag she was my hero
